MODULE.name: PrintingEpson
MODULE.HELP_OVERVIEW:
Example extension api ## Enabling the API In order to use this API you must include the following extension in your `build.yml` :::ruby extensions: ["printing_epson"]
The `printing_epson` extension is also included automatically if you specify the following in your `build.yml` :::ruby app_type: "rhoelements"
**NOTE: If you are building a Windows Mobile or Windows CE app with this API, you must set your app_type as "rhoelements" in your build.yml as shown [here](../guide/build_config#other-build-time-settings).**
